title: Mystical

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may inverse the gamestate during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When you inverse the gamestate, if the game ends that night or tomorrow, day, whoever wins loses, and whoever loses wins.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Inverse the gamestate into a town loss or a state where at least 3 factions win. (NK’s are Factions).

desc:
Post 4575
*” Silly old me.. I don’t know what I’m talking about. “*
